body

The <body> element is the container for the main content of a <topic>.

Contains

(p or lq or note or dl or parml or ul or ol or sl or pre or codeblock or msgblock or screen or lines or fig or syntaxdiagram or imagemap or image or object or table or simpletable or required-cleanup or section or example) (any number)

Contained by

topic

Inheritance

topic/body

Attributes

Name Description Data Type Default Value Required?
%global-atts; (xtrf, xtrc) A set of related attributes, described at global-atts parameter entity PE not applicable Not applicable
class, outputclass Common attributes described in othercommon

Example

<topic>
<title>...</title>
<prolog>...</prolog> 
<body> ... ... </body> 
</topic>
